description.title: Edifier S3000Pro Bookshelf Bluetooth Speaker
description.details: The Edifier S3000Pro Bookshelf Bluetooth Speaker is a premium audio system that boasts impressive features for an immersive listening experience. The wireless left and right speaker setup allow for flexibility in the placement, while the HiRes certified audio ensures the highest quality sound reproduction. The Edifier S3000Pro speaker features planar diaphragm tweeters, which provide crystal clear highs and detailed midrange. The bass drivers consist of 6.5” (179mm) aluminum alloy diaphragm bass units that deliver powerful and dynamic bass with precision and accuracy. Edifier S3000Pro comes with Bluetooth V5.0 with Qualcomm aptX HD decoding, which provides high-quality wireless streaming with low latency and superior sound quality. This makes it easy to stream music from your phone or tablet without any loss in sound quality. The Edifier S3000Pro Bookshelf Bluetooth Speaker is a high-end audio system that delivers exceptional sound quality and versatility, making it perfect for audiophiles and music enthusiasts who demand the best.

features.Battery: Built-In Battery Lasts up to 13 Hours

description.title: Sony GTK-PG10 High Power Audio System Wireless Party Speaker
description.details: The Sony GTK-PG10 Wireless Speaker is ideal for enjoying music outside or indoors. This speaker lets you connect your mobile device to this speaker via Bluetooth technology to listen to your favorite tunes. You can also get connected using the USB Type-A port or the 3.5mm audio import, which lets you connect portable MP3 players that don't have Bluetooth connectivity. Moreover, the FM tuner and retractable antenna let you enjoy your favorite radio shows and channels. Partying somewhere without electricity will be no problem with the rechargeable battery, which gives you up to 13 hours of battery life. The Sony GTK-PG10 features Splashproof Top Panel with Cup Holders. When the top panel is open, it's the perfect place to put drinks and food. The Sony GTK-PG10's microphone input puts your vocals directly into the party. You can plug in a USB memory stick, smartphone, tablet, or laptop and play your digital files and charge your device at the same time. The Sony GTK-PG10 Wireless Party Speaker has a compact cube design and features built-in handles for portability and convenience. You can connect up to three different devices to this speaker simultaneously. This party speaker can also be mounted on a tripod. The Sony GTK-PG10 comes with no warranty.

description.title: Edifier R1580MB Active 2.0 Bluetooth Studio Bookshelf Speaker
description.details: Edifier R1580MB is one kind of Bluetooth Studio Bookshelf Speaker. This Bluetooth designed for commercial and professional use with two microphone inputs. Due to its low resonance, it is ideal for presentations, lectures and speeches in conference rooms, schools, classrooms and small halls. This Speaker featured with Dual microphone inputs for use as public address system, Bass, treble and master volume controls located on the side panel. Class D amplifier with 4inch bass drivers and 13mm silk dome tweeters. The speaker comes with Wireless remote control with mute and volume adjustment. This Speaker has 100% MDF wooden enclosure to minimize acoustic resonance, Universal 100V-240V power supply. This Bluetooth speaker is compatible with virtually all audio devices, RCA and AUX ports provide a quick and easy way of connecting to your source, ideal for turntables (separate phono pre-amp may be required for turntable). This speaker offering clear and bright voices with increased bass performance thanks to the bass reflex front port. The latest Edifier R1580MB comes with 01 year warranty.
